tool_description: Manages and validates carrier-specific configuration settings, API credentials, service types, and operational parameters for multiple shipping carriers.

carrier_name.description: Name of the shipping carrier (e.g., FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS)

api_key.description: API key or credential for carrier access

account_number.description: Carrier account number for negotiated rates

service_types.description: List of service types to enable (e.g., Ground, Express, Overnight)

active.description: Whether this carrier configuration is active

error_messages: Invalid carrier name: Carrier must be one of the supported providers (FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS, etc.)
Authentication failed: Invalid API key or account credentials for the specified carrier
Unsupported service type: One or more service types are not available for this carrier
Configuration validation failed: Carrier-specific configuration requirements not met
usage: Provide carrier_name, api_key, and service_types array. Optionally include account_number for negotiated rates and set active status. Returns validated configuration details.

carrier_id.description: Unique identifier for this carrier configuration

available_services.description: List of validated available service types
